Key Match Events: Riley Greene made a leaping catch at the left-field fence, preventing an RBI double or a two-run homer
Tarik Skubal caught Brenton Doyle’s sixth-inning comebacker with his hand instead of in his glove
Skubal allowed a run on Jordan Beck’s third-inning home run, a hanging curveball sent deep to left
Post-Match Reflections: The Tigers fell to 3 1/2 games behind Minnesota for the final AL Wild Card spot
Skubal stated that the loss stings a little bit, but the team will be alright as they keep racking up series wins
Spencer Torkelson mentioned that all losses suck, but they didn’t get a win, and they need to come back tomorrow ready to go
